name: PlingPlong (TomisGreen)
description:
PlingPlong! 

What is this magic of PlingPlong? There is none!

So what? PlingPlong!

This is a generic and boring clone of an arcade game!

So what? PlingPlong!

- Play as a paddle!

- Bounce a Ball!

- Win against the other paddle (it is impossible)

PlingPlong! The game of games!

The main antagonist of PlingPlong is an undefeatable, evil paddle
In PlingPlong you learn what it's like to experience live as a paddle
